name: MEC Travel Light Shoe Cube
description: Step up your packing game with suitcase-ready shoe organization. Designed to hold your shoes inside your suitcase or pack, this organizer is also great for separating dirty clothes from clean or active from casual. Compact and easy to stow, this lightweight shoe packing cube is part of MEC’s Travel Light series, a collection of packs and accessories designed for people on the move between urban, wilderness, recreational and work endeavours. Redesigned for 2018 to save 100,000 pieces of packaging.Made of nylon with a water-resistant silicone coating.Large clamshell lid with dual zipper pulls provides easy access.Webbing handle for carrying or hanging.Large enough to fit a pair of men's US size 12 hiking boots or lots and lots of flip flops.Small internal slip pocket doubles as stuff pocket to store the cube when you're not using it.
